newsitem.title: THAILAND: RESEARCH ALERT - Shinawatra Satel "a buy".
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Shinawatra Satel "a buy".

text.p: Seamico Research said on Friday it rated Shinawatra Satellite a buy on expected higher revenue after it launches another commercial satellite later this year.

Shinawatra Satellite is scheduled to launch its third satellite, Thaicom 3, in December and expected strong demand, especially for its C-band transponders, should significantly boost the company's revenue in 1997, securities company Seamico said in a research report.

Its first two satellites, Thaicom 1 and Thaicom 2, are both fully utilised and the company has temporarily put some of its new customers on foreign satellites until Thaicom 3 is operational, Seamico said.
"On a discounted cashflow basis, Shinawatra Satellite's fair value is estimated to be 37 baht per share. We recommend buy below 40 baht," it added.
Shinawatra Satellite was trading 0.25 baht lower at 39.50 by the lunch break on Friday.
